column4: in the wiki I see a confusing instruction... 'Extract grldr from the archive to c:\grldr. The rest of the files in the archive are unnecessary. (If your default compression/archive program doesn't like *.gz files, try 7-Zip from www.7-zip.org.)'
does that mean that I should extract grldr to the C drive or into a folder called grldr on the c drive?
